fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Destructive: Your hand limit is 6, and you draw 1 extra card each phase. You are immune to Chaosâ€™ Night phase attack. *You must also choose a role to disguise within the first phase of the game.* Affects up to Susceptible checks. 
- Some Strings Attached: You will know at all times who has at least one card with a String attached.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Curios: Gain a non-duel won card of your choice. [3 uses, 1 CD] 
- Entangle: Select a player other than yourself. Choose a card they draw in the next phase. It will secretly come with a String attached to it. [Infinite uses, 1 CD, Astral]
- Tug: Steal a card with a String attached. Gains a use whenever a player still holds a card with a String attached at the end of a Phase. [0 uses, Recharging, Astral]
- Death Bind: Play a Reforged Upgraded Attack! on a player. Gains a use whenever a player is Killed by you (including reforges) OR someone using a card with a String attached. [0 uses, Recharging]
- Puppet: Choose a player who used a card with a String attached at any point in this game. Next phase, you control all of their card-playing actions. You will know their entire hand and can make them play any cards they have. They will be unable to trade/use cards at all. [1 use, Unique, Astral]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last player remaining, excluding Mountebank/Outsider King.
